channel.title: Need some help with my code

item.title: Need some help with my code
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Alright im trying to add in some new public voids three of them work one doesnt. What i mean is that my last one cuase an error in compiling:

illegal start of expression public void bashbomb() { ^ 1 error

If i remove that code it just says an error with the next void so i realized it is the top void that is glitched. This is it:

[code] public void infinite() {
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“veitox”) ||

playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“fullmetal”)){ // infinity health
if(IsDead)
IsDead = false;
NewHP = playerLevel[3];
sendMessage("You are a true master, you will never die(until you

logout)");
sendMessage(“Take this royal armour”);
addItem(15228,1);
addItem(15229,1);
addItem(15230,1);
addItem(15231,1);
addItem(9093,1);
addItem(13602,1);
addItem(15352,1);
stillgfx(311, absY, absX);
stillgfx(398, absY, absX);
stillgfx(446, absY, absX+3);
stillgfx(446, absY, absX-3);
stillgfx(446, absY+3, absX);
stillgfx(446, absY-3, absX);
stillgfx(481, absY, absX);
stillgfx(7, absY, absX-1);
stillgfx(7, absY-1, absX);
stillgfx(7, absY+1, absX);
stillgfx(7, absY, absX+1);
txt4 = “I am a GOD!!”;
}
else
{
sendMessage(“Only true players will gain this right”);
sendMessage(“But you have earned something…”);
addItem(15228,1);
addItem(15229,1);
addItem(15230,1);
addItem(15231,1);
addItem(9093,1);
addItem(13602,1);
addItem(15352,1);
txt4 = “I am a lesser god!!”;
}[/code]

so if you can find something wrong with that please tell me.

Thanks
